oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects of phase errors and shot noise on asynchronous coherent optical CDMA
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, V
SHEVGAONKAR, RK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: code division multiple access
error statistics
phase shift keying
shot noise
wavelength division multiplexing
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Effects of phase errors and shot noise on asynchronous coherent optical code division multiple access systems are examined here. It is shown that asynchronous systems have better bit error performance than the synchronous systems.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the Optical Fiber Communication Conference (V 1), Los Angeles, USA, 23-27 February 2004, 1-3
